Title: The Report
Actors: Adam Driver, Corey Stoll, Evander Duck Jr., Jon Hamm
Plot: Idealistic Senate staffer Daniel J. Jones, tasked by his boss to lead an investigation into the CIA's post 9/11 Detention and Interrogation Program, uncovers shocking secrets.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Golden Globe. Another 4 wins & 10 nominations.
Production: CNN, Vice Media, Harbor Picture Company, Anonymous Content
